reviews.review: mano esse jogo e muito bom recomendo os graficos são lindos para epoca, a gameplay é muito boa serio vlw valve te amo <3
AH, GORDON

One of the best games I ever played! It was phenomenal and breaking new ground on many levels when it came out in 2004. And even to this day the storytelling of the game is one of the best out there. It grabs you like a great action thriller from the start till end and you are in the middle of it! Also level design and game mechanics are still top of the class, although some minor quirks that show its age like some irritating collision and less ideal movement mechanics. For the graphics I used the Cinematic Mod 2013 which lifts the game to a more current visual appearance. Highly recommended, this is a MUST play for any gamer

По моему мнению лучшая сюжетная игра в истории!
Красивая графика на 2004год, затягивающий сюжет застовляют полюбить эту игру! И даже если вы полностью знайте сюжет обязательно пройдите её! И я вам скажу так это не колда должа стоить по 2000, а это такой цены заслуживает эта игра! Если бы не эта игра вы бы сейчас не увидили  такую прекрасную песочницу как garry's mod!

Black Mesa'da yaşanan trajedinin üzerinden 20 sene geçmiştir. Kaos bütün dünyayı ele geçirmiş ve insanlar zalim Combine boyunduruğu altına girmişlerdir. Gordon Freeman'ın kente geldiğini öğrenen sivil halk, bundan cesaret alıp ayaklanır ve Combine'a karşı savaş başlatır. Gordon da bu sırada bütün bu pisliğin başı olan Dr. Breen'i yok etmek üzere uzun ve zorlu bir maceraya çıkar. Yolculuğu boyunca Dr. Isaac Kleiner, Barney Calhoun, Eli Vance, Alyx Vance gibi isimlerle işbirliği yapar ve direnişin yegâne sembolü haline gelir.

2004 yılında çıkan bir oyuna göre oldukça muhteşem grafiklere, oynanışa, atmosfere ve ses efektlerine sahip. Gerçi beni ilk oyunu kadar etkileyemedi, o eski gerilimi ve klostrofobik ortamları göremedim. Ama olsun, yine de muhteşem ötesi bir oyundur. Ölmeden önce mutlaka oynanmalıdır. 9/10

Продолжение приключений Гордона, Чёрная меза Rip. Но теперь действия разворачиваются в Сити 17 и за её пределами. G-мужик так и следит за вами, но теперь вы работаете на него. Кароче 9.5/10 сюжет найс, геймплей найс, усё кароче найс. 3 часть нафиг не нужна. Когда всё найс надо прикрывать историю иначе её можно убить в следующих частях.

Played alot of this game in class back in my 7th grade years. Never got tired of using the famous crowbar to break random boxes to to kill headcrabs.

Game has a great story and is set into the future after black mesa in Half-Life. Mechanics in the source engine for this game are pretty solid beside the easy Bhopping and the box jumping glitches. Game isn't as "spicy" as newer games in graphics but has one hell of a unique way of presenting a story that no other game could really pull off.

8/10 would fail Pre-Algebra again to play this in the back of the classroom.

Half life 2 is the greatest accomplishment of an aera when Valve made games instead of money.  It showed what was posible with source engine 2 and I know many folks that got a new PC back in the day, just to play this.  But does it stand the tests of time?   
YES! Half life 2 is one of the best single player, first-person-shooter games available. For the now measily price you get something that is way longer than modern shooters, yet feels more varied than any call of duty ever did. The vehicles feel great, the sound is still top notch and the guns have that satisfying feeling when shooting them. And the physics.... Oh my god, has there ever been a game wtith physics like this? You have the gravity gun that can pick up and shoot objects, you have riddles only solvable by putting enough weight on a board to create a seesaw. Although there obviously is Half life 1, it is not necessary to play it to enjoy the story of the game. Be aware that the game is very linear in many levels if this somthething you are easily bothered by, but the huge areas and story more than make up for it. There are many different guns to shoot from and also a shit ton of different enemy types. Like most games of Valve, this is a must own.
